summary.span: 为所有块级别流内容元素提供基类的抽象类。

span.span: An abstract class that provides a base for all block-level flow content elements.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 继承元素类 (如) 可以在一个公共父级下的元素进行分组或将公用特性应用于组。Elements that inherit from the class (such as ) can be used to group elements under a common parent or to apply common attributes to a group. 从概念上讲，它类似于如何使用\ 标记中的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)]。Conceptually, this is similar to how you might use the \
tag in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)].

summary.span: 获取或设置某个 元素所包含的任何 元素的重新定位方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction in which any elements contained by a element should be repositioned.

value.span: 值之一，它指定将 元素中所包含的任何 元素与其他内容分隔开来的方向。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the direction in which to separate any elements from other content contained in the element.

value.span: 默认值为 ，它指示浮标应在现有位置上呈现。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that floaters should be rendered in place.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性会影响内容中的布局方式且旨在用于防止拥塞的内容中的元素元素。The property affects how content is laid out within a and is intended to be used to prevent elements from congesting the contents of a element. 为此属性使浮标重新定位在统一方向在指定方向内容。Specifying a direction for this property causes floaters to be repositioned in a uniform direction within the content. Floater 不会重新定位到其父。Floaters are not repositioned outside of their parent . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

member this.FlowDirection : System.Windows.FlowDirection with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 元素中内容流的相对方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the relative direction for flow of content within a element.

value.span: 值之一，指定相对流动方向。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the relative flow direction.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性将返回当前有效的流动方向。Getting this property returns the currently effective flow direction. 设置此属性将导致 元素的内容重新沿指示的方向流动。Setting this property causes the contents of the element to re-flow in the indicated direction. 内容的流方向通常对应于所表示的语言的固有流动方向。The flow direction of content typically corresponds to the innate flow direction of the language being represented. 希伯来语和阿拉伯语是从右到左流动的语言的示例。Hebrew and Arabic are examples of languages that naturally flow from right to left. 英语、 德语和俄语是自然流动从左到右的语言的示例。English, German, and Russian are examples of languages that naturally flow from left to right. > [!NOTE] > **此属性的值不会自动更改以匹配由操作系统使用的语言。如果你需要使用不同值 th****n 默认值的** **，您必须自行指定。****The value of this property is not automatically changed to match the language used by the operating system. If you need to use a different value th**a**n the default of** **, you must specify it yourself.** ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置的属性元素 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirectionXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_flowdirectionxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_flowdirection)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_flowdirection)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsHyphenationEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsHyphenationEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用文字的自动断字功能。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether automatic hyphenation of words is enabled or disabled.

value.span: 如果启用自动对文字进行断字和添加连字符，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if automatic breaking and hyphenation of words is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自动断字功能使元素自动中断和断字的单词，根据当前布局情况。The automatic word hyphenation feature enables a element to automatically break and hyphenate words, based on current layout conditions. 这使得较长的单词，一个行上开始并继续此下一步，从而更均匀地分布的对齐文本中的空白区域。This enables long words to begin on one line and continue on this next, and tends to achieve a more even distribution of white space in justified text. 断字和、 连字符、 根据标准语法规则。Words are broken and hyphenated according to standard grammar rules. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性的元素。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_HyphenateXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_hyphenatexaml)] 下图显示了前面的示例中的呈现效果。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders. ![屏幕快照： 已启用 FlowDocument 连字符](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphenenabled.png "屏幕快照： 启用连字符的 FlowDocument")![Screenshot: FlowDocument hyphen enabled](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphenenabled.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument hyphen enabled") 下图显示的 = `false`。The following figure shows how the same example renders with the default setting of =`false`. ![屏幕快照： 已禁用的连字符开头 FlowDocument](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphendisabled.png "屏幕快照： 具有禁用的连字符的 FlowDocument")![Screenshot: FlowDocument with disabled hyphens](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphendisabled.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument with disabled hyphens") 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_Hyphenate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_hyphenate)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_Hyphenate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_hyphenate)]

summary.span: 获取或设置各行内容的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of each line of content.

value.span: 以设备独立像素为单位，范围为 0.0034 到 160000，在每个行的高度或将自动确定高度。

span.span: The height of each line in device independent pixels, in the range of 0.0034 to 160000, or to determine the height automatically.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值为(等效于特性值的`Auto`) 指示行高度由当前字体特征自动确定。A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of `Auto`) indicates that the line height is determined automatically from the current font characteristics. 更改此值不会更改关联的文本; 的高度相反，它将更改包含文本行的高度。Changing this value does not change the height of the associated text; rather, it changes the height of the line that contains the text. 若要更改文本的大小，请使用属性。To change the size of the text, use the property. 除了此属性中的行的布局受其属性。In addition to this property, the layout of lines in a is affected by its property. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

span.span: is set to a non-positive value.

summary.span: 获取或设置为块级别流内容元素内的每行文本确定行框的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets how a line box is determined for each line of text within the block-level flow content element.

value.span: 值之一，它指定为块级别流内容元素内的每行文本确定行框的方式。

span.span: One of the values that specifies how a line box is determined for each line of text within the block-level flow content element.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此依赖项属性还具有附加的属性用法。This dependency property also has an attached property usage. 在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，这种用法并\<*对象* ="*值*".../ >，其中*对象*是对象元素 （通常流元素）包含在派生的类，并*值*是一个字符串值的枚举。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is \<*object* ="*value*".../>, where *object* is an object element (typically a flow element) contained within a derived class, and *value* is a string value of the enumeration. 在代码中，附加的属性用法受和方法。In code, the attached property usage is supported by the and methods. 附加的属性使用情况不常见。The attached property usage is not common. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定行框的文本行的创建方式。The following example shows how to use the property to determine how the line boxes are created for text lines of a . 第一个已的值第二个的值为。The first has a value of and the second has a value of . [!code-xaml[FlowMiscSnippets_snip#LineStackingStrategyExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowMiscSnippets_snip/cs/linestackingstrategyexample.xaml#linestackingstrategyexamplewholepage)] 下图显示了前面的代码中的结果。The following illustration shows the result of the preceding code. ![屏幕快照： 比较 LineStackingStrategy 值](~/add/media/flow-linestackingstrategy.gif "屏幕快照： 比较 LineStackingStrategy 值")![Screenshot: Compare LineStackingStrategy values](~/add/media/flow-linestackingstrategy.gif "Screenshot: Compare LineStackingStrategy values")

summary.span: 获取或设置元素的边距粗细。

span.span: Gets or sets the margin thickness for the element.

value.span: 一个结构，它以设备独立像素为单位指定要应用的边距量。

span.span: A structure that specifies the amount of margin to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认为统一粗细，即零 (0.0)。

span.span: The default is a uniform thickness of zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是超出了元素的内容区域，该元素的内容区域的边缘和父元素的边缘之间的缓冲区空间。 is buffer space that falls outside an element's content area, between the edges of the element's content area and the edges of the parent element. 与之相反，这是范围内元素的内容区域，该元素的内容和元素的内部边缘之间的缓冲区空间。Contrast with , which is buffer space that falls inside an element's content area, between the element's content and the inner edge of the element. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SiblingBlocks As BlockCollection

summary.span: 获取一个 元素的集合，这些元素是当前 元素的同级元素。

span.span: Gets a collection of elements that are siblings to the current element.

value.span: 一个包含子级 元素的 ，这些元素直接由当前 元素的父级承载；如果当前 元素无父级，则为 。

span.span: A that contains the child elements that are directly hosted by the parent of the current element, or if the current element has no parent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回包含通过其访问集合; 即，被视为拥有此属性的元素用于生成的同级的集合的目的是其自身的同级元素。The returned by this property includes the element through which the collection is accessed; that is, the element that owns this property is considered to be its own sibling for the purposes of generating the collection of siblings.

summary.span: 获取或设置文本内容的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of text content.

value.span: 值之一，它指定所需对齐方式。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the desired alignment.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性的元素。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_TextAlignmentXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_textalignmentxaml)] 下图显示了前面的示例中使用的呈现效果文本对齐方式 （默认值）。The following figure shows how the preceding example renders with text alignment (the default). ![屏幕快照： TextAlign 属性值为左对齐](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-left.png "屏幕快照： TextAlign 属性值为左对齐")![Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Left](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-left.png "Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Left") 下图显示了同一个示例使用的呈现效果文本对齐方式。The following figure shows how the same example renders with text alignment. ![屏幕快照： TextAlign 值 Right](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-right.png "屏幕快照： TextAlign 值 Right")![Screenshot: TextAlign value of Right](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-right.png "Screenshot: TextAlign value of Right") 下图显示了同一个示例使用的呈现效果文本对齐方式。The following figure shows how the same example renders with text alignment. ![屏幕快照： TextAlign 属性值 Center](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-center.png "屏幕快照： TextAlign 属性值 Center")![Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Center](~/add/media/flowdoc-textalign-center.png "Screenshot: TextAlign property value of Center") 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_TextAlignment](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_textalignment)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_TextAlignment](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_textalignment)]
